ValidationRule.description: B14 - if Binder Cover Option value = Text, then the Client Name to be Printed on Binder field must NOT be Null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), (ISPICKVAL(Art__c, 'Text') ), ( (ISBLANK(Client_Name_to_be_Printed_on_Binder__c)) || (ISNULL(Client_Name_to_be_Printed_on_Binder__c)) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Client Name to be Printed on Binder value when selecting the Binder Cover Option value of 'Text'.
